name: Protected Sky of Nagel
desc: "Tindangle" monsters in your Main Monster Zone cannot be destroyed by battle or your opponent's card effects. Each turn, the first battle damage your "Tindangle" monster inflicts to your opponent becomes doubled. You can banish this card from your GY and discard 1 "Tindangle" card; add 1 "Protected Sky of Nagel" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Protected Sky of Nagel" once per turn.
